messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Security Report

Thanks to the tireless efforts of our security and intelligence divisions, there are currently no credible threats to Burning Fortress Tango. All station construction projects have been authorized. Have a secure shift!

messages.author: Chief Engineer's Desk
messages.body: SSSupermatter engine isss now online, enjoy the power

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Anomaly Alert

Pyroclastic anomaly detected on long range scanners. Expected location: Port Bow Maintenance.

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Oh crap, get the mop.

Meaty ores have been detected on collision course with the station.

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Power Systems Nominal

Power has been restored to Burning Fortress Tango. We apologize for the inconvenience.

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Migration Alert

Due to Ragnarok, a number of energy draining parasites have stampeded into the [REDACTED].

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Anomaly Alert

Localized high-intensity vortex anomaly detected on long range scanners. Expected location: Research and Development

messages.author: Central Command Update
messages.body: Greetings, Space Station 13, We have recieved reports of "I'm fucking bored" So, Ya'll wanna go home?

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Power Systems Nominal

Power has been restored to Burning Fortress Tango. We apologize for the inconvenience.

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Anomaly Alert

Localized hyper-energetic flux wave detected on long range scanners. Expected location: Technical Storage.

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Anomaly Alert

Ion storm detected near the station. Please check all AI-controlled equipment for errors.

messages.author: Emmanuel N. Wittgenstein (Curator)
messages.body:
Kayla Moore, a savior!

Kayla Moore today on Burning Fortress Tango, has saved head chairman and CEO of Emmanuel Enterprises - the late of age, Emmanuel N. Wittgenstein from certain death of a mime nicknamed Silent Mime ! , He constructed a powerful IED firebomb and set it off and attempted to toss it at Emmanuel N. Wittgenstein, and Kayla gave him the slip and he ate his own IED.

Another hero, and an existing celebrity grows in wealth and fame on the News!

On other news, Emmanuel N. Wittgenstein's net worth has grown to TC5,852,453,998.021 !

END OF ENTERPRISE BLOG.
